post.description: OAuth2 compatible token login, get an access token for future requests
Create new user without the need to be logged in.

get.description: Get a specific user by id.
Retrieve tools with a favourited status for the current user.

post.description: Create new tool along with its params.
Add a tool to the current user's favourites.

delete.description: Remove a tool from the current user's favourites.

post.description:
Create and run a run of a specific tool, validating against predefined tool parameters.
Accepts both files and regular parameters dynamically.

patch.description: Cancel all active runs with status pending or running.

get.description: Retrieve active runs with status pending or running.

delete.description: Delete a specific run by ID.
